title: The Heavenly Fox
description: Lymee had always been a bit of a recluse preferring to spend time reading and playing strategy games when she is not at the Dojo hitting things. Everything changes when she wakes up wounded and in the middle of an ongoing battle that seems to be set in ancient China. Not sure how she got there or what is happening Lymee ends up saving a a woman from being killed who turns out to be the ruler of the land she is in. From there Lymee gets caught up in wars, political intrigue, and lesbian love. The Heavenly Fox is the first full length novel in the Dynasty Saga of approximately 80,000 words.
author: Sam Ryan
